captions.text:
Your Honor, would the court be willing
to grant me a short bathroom break ?

- Can't it wait ?
- Yes, it can.

But l've heard that if you hold it,
it can damage the prostate gland,

making it very difficult
to get an erection !

- Is that true ?
- It has to be.

Well, in that case, l better
take a little break myself.

But you get back here immediately
so we can finish this.

How am l going
to get out of this ?

What the hell
are you doing ?

l'm kicking my ass !
Do you mind ?

[ Bailiff ] l found him like this
in the bathroom, Your Honor.
Somebody beat the hell out of him.

- Who did this ?
- A madman, Your Honor !

A desperate fool at the end
of his pitiful rope !

title: Liar Liar (8/9) Movie CLIP - I'm Kicking My Ass! (1997) HD

comments.author: jgonz185

comments.text:
Liar Liar was without doubt Jim Carrey's most OTT comedy. But it was still 
a funny movie nonetheless. He is desperate or a way out of the court case 
because he cannot lie. So he asks to be let into the bathroom. He then 
after headbutting the wall comes up with an idea. He beats himself up. When 
the other guy comes into the bathroom and says "What the hell are you 
doing? his response is simple. I am kickin' my ass! D'ya mind? Funny scene.﻿

comments.text:
(PART 1) So my dad had some friends over a few weeks ago and we were all 
drinking together and we got to talking about movies. my dad said his 
favorite actor was Jim Carrey, and this was his favorite Jim Carrey movie, 
and this was his favorite scene of the movie. and he said they probably 
didnt even tell him how to beat himself up. they probably just told him to 
go in the bathroom and beat himself up. and yes we all agreed lol. true 
genius cannot be scripted.
